name: Finger Physics HD Free
description:
40+ million fingers have enjoyed Finger Physics Free on iPhone (yup, you read that right). Now, it's time to give those fingers more room to breathe and spread their proverbial wings with Finger Physics FREE HD. That's right - Finger Physics Free for iPad is finally here!

“Finger Physics is AWESOME.” Eros Resmini, VP Openfeint

“Bottom Line: Finger Physics is world-class game at a bargain price.” James Savage, Macworld.com

Finger Physics FREE HD is:
- 27 levels of awesome with sweet (wait, is this 1994?) HD graphics
- 7 game modes including tons of Egg levels (everyone's favorite!)
- Exploding blocks
- Magnetized circles, squares and triangles (it's way more fun that it sounds)
- Shapes that float and shapes that don’t
- OpenFeint integration with tons of achievements and global leader board for free play levels.
- Regular updates with MORE FREE LEVELS!!!

If you don't get Finger Physics FREE HD, your fingers WILL go on strike. "Yea, right", you say? Don't say we didn't warn you.
